entry.name: compactView
entry.label: If true it only shows a button for the application menu.

entry.name: fillWidth
entry.label: If true it always fill the maximum available width, even when there are no menu items shown.

entry.name: filterByActive
entry.label: If true it only shows the app menu if the current window that provides its menu is also active

entry.name: filterChildrenWindows
entry.label: If true it only shows the app menu only for the current active window and not for its children

entry.name: filterByScreen
entry.label: If true it only shows the app menu if the current active window is in the same screen with the plasmoid

entry.name: windowTitleIsPresent
entry.label: try to identify if windowTitle exists in the same containment. This is set only with applets cooperation

entry.name: showWindowTitleOnMouseExit
entry.label: will become hidden in favour of appmenu when the mouse hovers the applet

entry.name: supportsActiveWindowSchemes
entry.label: current option will become available in such case

entry.name: containmentType
entry.label: it helps to enable/disable options that are specific to plasma or Latte panels

entry.name: toggleMaximizedOnDoubleClick
entry.label: If true, toggles active window maximized/restored on double click
